name: Nupperibo
resistance: acid, cold; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered
senses: blindsight 10 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 11

traits.name: Cloud of Vermin
traits.desc: Any creature, other than a devil, that starts its turn within 20 feet of the nupperibo must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw. A creature within the areas of two or more nupperibos makes the saving throw with disadvantage. On a failure, the creature takes 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

traits.name: Hunger-Driven
traits.desc: In the Nine Hells, the nupperibos can flawlessly track any creature that has taken damage from any nupperibo's Cloud of Vermin within the previous 24 hours.
